label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"矿物质缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":11,"end":12,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"体液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":53,"end":56,"text":"分泌物","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":67,"end":69,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":70,"end":73,"text":"淋巴液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":79,"end":81,"text":"体液","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 矿物质缺乏症：矿物质是鸡生命活动过程中不可缺乏的物质，是鸡体组织生长和修补的重要物质，它是血液、体液和某些分泌物的重要组成部分，可调节血液、淋巴液的渗透压，使体液渗透压恒定；

label: [{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":53,"end":54,"text":"酶","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 能维持血液的酸碱平衡，使血液保持恒定的pH;是多种酶类的重要组成部分，影响其他营养在体内的溶解度，激活某些酶的活性，增强消化能力；

label: [{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"神经肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]}]
text: 维持神经肌肉的兴奋性，使鸡体保持正常的生命活动。

label: [{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]}]
text: 但是，鸡体所需要的矿物质都不能自己合成，必须由饲料中摄取。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]}]
text: 根据鸡体所需矿物质的数量和比例，可将其分为两种，一是常量矿物质元素，如钙、磷、钠、钾、氯、镁、硫7种，通常占鸡体重量的0.01%以上；

label: [{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]}]
text: 二是微量矿物质元素，如铁、铜、碘、硒、锰、锌、钼、钴、硅、氟、铬11种，占鸡体重量的0.01%以下。

label: [{"start":10,"end":11,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 不同品种、不同日龄的鸡对矿物质的需要量不同，其中以钙、磷的需要量最大，钙占49%,磷占27%,而其余的仅占24%。

label: [{"start":24,"end":25,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 矿物质微量元素虽然需要量少，但必须保证供给才能使鸡的生产性能正常发挥。

label: [{"start":15,"end":16,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 使用时应注意下列问题：一是满足鸡的生命活动中的需要，不可过量；

label: [{"start":3,"end":16,"text":"保证各种微量元素的均衡供给","labels":["control"]}]
text: 二是要保证各种微量元素的均衡供给，避免各元素之间的缺乏或过量；

label: [{"start":62,"end":65,"text":"铜缺乏","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 三是各元素之间的协同和颉颜作用，如钙与锌、镁、锰、铜之间有筑颅作用，饲料中钙过多会影响锌、镁、锰、铜的吸收，造成锌、镁、锰、铜缺乏；

label: [{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"锌过量","labels":["disease"]},{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"锌过量","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":35,"text":"铜代谢紊乱","labels":["disease"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"贫血","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 锰过多则影响钙的吸收；铜不足可引起锌过量、中毒，锌过量可引起铜代谢紊乱，导致贫血。

label: [{"start":4,"end":16,"text":"日粮配制中要合理添加使用","labels":["control"]},{"start":38,"end":46,"text":"矿物质元素缺乏症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 所以，在日粮配制中要合理添加使用。因为日粮中缺乏矿物质元素或配备不合理常造成矿物质元素缺乏症。

label: [{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 无机盐在细胞中的含量很少，却是生物组织的重要材料，对维持生物体的生命活动、维持细胞的形态和功能有重要作用。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]}]
text: 虽然鸡体内无机盐类的含量很少，但其在营养中却起着重要作用。

label: [{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"禽类","labels":["type"]},{"start":30,"end":31,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 在禽类所需要的18种无机元素中，任何一种元素供应不足，都会使鸡的体质、增重、饲料利用率和繁殖率受到严重影响，甚至引起疾病和死亡。

label: [{"start":9,"end":14,"text":"无机盐缺乏","labels":["disease"]},{"start":69,"end":74,"text":"胫骨短粗症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":75,"end":78,"text":"佝偻病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":79,"end":87,"text":"胫骨软骨发育不良","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 但在实际生产中，因无机盐缺乏导致的疾病常不引起人们的足够重视。实践证明，当饲料中缺乏Mn、Zn、Ca、P、Cu、Cl等无机元素时，常可引起胫骨短粗症、佝偻病及胫骨软骨发育不良等病。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"合理搭配饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"科学饲养","labels":["control"]},{"start":17,"end":23,"text":"无机盐代谢病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 因此，合理搭配饲料，科学饲养是预防无机盐代谢病的关键。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"钙和磷缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":16,"text":"钙和磷缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":26,"text":"维生素D₃","labels":["drug"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"幼禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":49,"end":52,"text":"成年禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":76,"end":78,"text":"幼禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":84,"end":86,"text":"成禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":41,"end":48,"text":"骨组织钙化不全","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"钙化不全","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"脱钙","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":56,"end":61,"text":"骨组织变软","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":59,"end":61,"text":"变软","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":62,"end":64,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":69,"text":"易于弯曲","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":44,"text":"骨组织","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":56,"end":59,"text":"骨组织","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":80,"end":83,"text":"佝偻病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":89,"end":92,"text":"骨软病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: （一)钙和磷缺乏症：钙和磷缺乏症是机体缺乏维生素D₃、钙和磷或钙磷比例失调所致幼禽骨组织钙化不全或成年禽脱钙，使骨组织变软、肿大、易于弯曲为特征的疾病。幼禽称为佝偻病，成禽则称为骨软病。

label: [{"start":0,"end":1,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":38,"end":43,"text":"钙磷缺乏症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 鸡生长发育和产蛋期对钙磷需要量较大，如果饲料中钙、磷含量补充不足，则容易产生钙磷缺乏症。饲料中钙、磷比例失调。

label: [{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"产蛋鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 会影响两种元素的吸收，雏鸡和产蛋鸡的饲料中钙磷比应为(2~4):1。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"维生素D","labels":["drug"]},{"start":24,"end":30,"text":"维生素D缺乏","labels":["disease"]},{"start":35,"end":40,"text":"钙磷缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":44,"end":47,"text":"球虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":48,"end":51,"text":"白痢病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"拉稀","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 维生素D在钙磷吸收和代谢过程中起着重要作用，如果维生素D缺乏，则会引起钙磷缺乏症的发生。球虫病、白痢病等引起拉稀时均能影响钙吸收。

label: [{"start":63,"end":66,"text":"缺乏症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 其他因素如饲料中蛋白质、脂肪、植酸盐含量过多、环境温度过高、运动少、日照不足及疾病、生理状态等都会影响钙、磷代谢和需要量而引起缺乏症。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"雏禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"佝偻病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"步态跛瘸","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"运动困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":46,"text":"骨骼发育异常","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"发育异常","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":47,"end":51,"text":"关节肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":63,"end":67,"text":"胸骨畸形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":67,"text":"畸形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":68,"end":79,"text":"肋骨末端呈念珠状小结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":73,"end":79,"text":"念珠状小结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":80,"end":86,"text":"生长发育不良","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"骨骼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":52,"end":55,"text":"跗关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":60,"end":62,"text":"腿骨","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":63,"end":65,"text":"胸骨","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":68,"end":72,"text":"肋骨末端","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 雏禽典型症状是佝偻病。发病较快，1~4周龄出现症状。主要表现步态跛瘸、运动困难，骨骼发育异常，关节肿大，跗关节尤其明显，腿骨及胸骨畸形，肋骨末端呈念珠状小结节，生长发育不良。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"成禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":13,"end":16,"text":"高产鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"骨软症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":17,"end":27,"text":"产蛋高峰期产蛋量下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"产薄壳蛋","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":38,"text":"软壳蛋","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":39,"end":44,"text":"蛋壳易破碎","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 成禽易发生骨软症，主要是在高产鸡的产蛋高峰期产蛋量下降、最初产薄壳蛋或软壳蛋，蛋壳易破碎。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"蛋壳表面畸形","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"沙皮","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":15,"text":"孵化率下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":18,"end":24,"text":"骨骼变松变脆","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"变松变脆","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":27,"end":32,"text":"自发性骨折","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"腿软","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"卧地不起","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":45,"end":49,"text":"龙骨弯曲","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"弯曲","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":50,"end":54,"text":"笼养蛋鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":58,"end":65,"text":"笼养蛋鸡疲劳症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"骨骼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":34,"text":"腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":41,"end":42,"text":"爪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":44,"text":"喙","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"龙骨","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 蛋壳表面畸形、沙皮、孵化率下降，继而骨骼变松变脆，导致自发性骨折，腿软，卧地不起：爪、喙、龙骨弯曲。笼养蛋鸡则易发生笼养蛋鸡疲劳症。

label: [{"start":4,"end":13,"text":"全身骨骼骨密质变薄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"变薄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":19,"text":"骨髓腔变大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"变大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":23,"text":"易骨折","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":33,"text":"胸骨和肋骨自然骨折","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"自然骨折","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":51,"text":"肋骨局部有念珠状突起","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":51,"text":"念珠状突起","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"全身骨骼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"骨密质","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"骨髓腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"胸骨","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"肋骨","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"脊柱","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"肋骨","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 剖检可见全身骨骼骨密质变薄，骨髓腔变大，易骨折，胸骨和肋骨自然骨折，与脊柱连接处的肋骨局部有念珠状突起。

label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"立即增加饲料中钙","labels":["control"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"维生素D","labels":["drug"]},{"start":34,"end":37,"text":"鱼肝油","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 立即增加饲料中钙、磷水平，调整好比例，应以3倍于平时剂量的维生素D或鱼肝油2~3周.然后再恢复到正常饲喂。

label: [{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"化验饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"磷酸氢钙","labels":["drug"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"骨粉","labels":["drug"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"贝壳粉","labels":["drug"]},{"start":33,"end":40,"text":"增加运动和光照","labels":["control"]}]
text: 当然，最好能够化验饲料。补充钙磷可用磷酸氢钙、骨粉、贝壳粉等原料。增加运动和光照，可提高疗效。

label: [{"start":11,"end":12,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"维生素D","labels":["drug"]},{"start":16,"end":22,"text":"比例也要适当","labels":["control"]},{"start":25,"end":34,"text":"注意维生素D的给予","labels":["control"]}]
text: 饲料中钙、磷含量要满足鸡的需要，比例也要适当，同时注意维生素D的给予。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":42,"end":45,"text":"贝壳粉","labels":["drug"]},{"start":61,"end":65,"text":"维生素D","labels":["drug"]},{"start":77,"end":83,"text":"钙和磷缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":37,"end":45,"text":"饲料中添加贝壳粉","labels":["control"]},{"start":56,"end":65,"text":"饲料中添加维生素D","labels":["control"]}]
text: 雏鸡钙与有效磷的比例为0.6%~0.9%:0.4%~0.55%。可在每千克饲料中添加贝壳粉7.5g,同时于每千克饲料中添加维生素D2000IU,可有效预防钙和磷缺乏症的发生。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"氯和钠缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":16,"text":"氯和钠缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":28,"end":34,"text":"机体代谢紊乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":41,"end":48,"text":"营养缺乏性疾病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":57,"end":61,"text":"生长迟缓","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":65,"end":71,"text":"神经机能障碍","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":72,"end":74,"text":"脱水","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":75,"end":80,"text":"蛋产量减少","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":62,"end":64,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":65,"end":67,"text":"神经","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":67,"end":71,"text":"机能障碍","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: (二)氯和钠缺乏症：氯和钠缺乏症是由于氯和钠摄入不足引起机体代谢紊乱等一系列症状的营养缺乏性疾病，其发病症状主要是生长迟缓，肌肉、神经机能障碍，脱水，蛋产量减少等。

label: [{"start":42,"end":48,"text":"氯和钠缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":61,"end":66,"text":"食盐缺乏症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 饲料中氯和钠主要来源是食盐、鱼粉和肉、骨粉，其中含氯和钠较多，饲料中食盐添加量不足是氯和钠缺乏症的主要病因，因此有时又称为食盐缺乏症。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"食盐缺乏","labels":["disease"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"生长停滞","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":15,"end":22,"text":"典型的神经症状","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":34,"text":"受惊时躯体向前倒","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":40,"text":"两脚向后伸","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":41,"end":45,"text":"不能站立","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"两脚","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 雏鸡食盐缺乏时生长停滞，并出现典型的神经症状。当病鸡受惊时躯体向前倒，两脚向后伸，不能站立，经数分钟可恢复正常；

label: [{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"休克死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":34,"text":"产蛋量下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"蛋形变小","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"体重减轻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":57,"end":62,"text":"肾上腺肥大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":60,"end":62,"text":"肥大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"成年蛋鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":57,"end":60,"text":"肾上腺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":49,"end":52,"text":"啄食癖","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 再次受惊时上述症状又重复出现，有时休克死亡。成年蛋鸡缺乏时产蛋量下降，蛋形变小。病鸡体重减轻并产生啄食癖。剖检可见肾上腺肥大。

label: [{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"连续饲喂","labels":["control"]}]
text: 立即在每千克饲料中添加800g食盐，连续饲喂1周后降至正常水平。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"锌缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"锌缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":27,"text":"羽毛发育不良","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"发育不良","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":34,"text":"生长发育停滞","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"骨骼异常","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":46,"text":"生殖机能下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":51,"end":58,"text":"营养缺乏性疾病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"异常","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"骨骼","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (三)锌缺乏症：锌缺乏症是由于缺乏锌引起以羽毛发育不良、生长发育停滞、骨骼异常、生殖机能下降等为特征的营养缺乏性疾病。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"地方性缺锌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 地方性缺锌：缺锌地区土壤含锌量很少，该地区生长的作物籽实也就缺锌。

label: [{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"家禽","labels":["type"]}]
text: 配方不当，锌添加量不足以满足家禽的需要。一般饲料原料如玉米中锌含量很低。钙、镁、铁、植酸盐过多，含铜量过低，不饱和脂肪酸缺乏，影响锌的吸收。其他因素如棉酚可与锌结合，使锌失去生物活性等。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"生长停滞","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":18,"text":"羽毛发育异常","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"发育异常","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"质差","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"易缺损","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":32,"text":"无羽毛","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":39,"text":"新羽不易生长","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"不易生长","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"新羽","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 雏鸡缺锌时表现生长停滞，羽毛发育异常，质差、易缺损，严重时无羽毛，新羽不易生长。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"皮炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"鳞屑增多","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":26,"text":"创伤不易愈合","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"长骨粗短","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"关节增大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"增大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"僵硬","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"两腿无力","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"无力","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":53,"text":"步态不稳","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":57,"end":62,"text":"产蛋量降低","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":63,"end":66,"text":"蛋壳薄","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":67,"end":71,"text":"孵化率低","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":74,"end":77,"text":"啄蛋癖","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"足趾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"长骨","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"两腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":54,"end":57,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"粗短","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"弯曲","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 发生皮炎、鳞屑增多，皮肤、足趾更为显著,创伤不易愈合，长骨粗短有时弯曲，关节增大、僵硬，两腿无力，步态不稳。成年鸡产蛋量降低，蛋壳薄，孵化率低，易发啄蛋癖。

label: [{"start":3,"end":4,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"肌内注射","labels":["control"]},{"start":13,"end":16,"text":"氧化锌","labels":["drug"]},{"start":33,"end":36,"text":"氧化锌","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 可每只鸡每天肌内注射5mg氧化锌或在每千克饲料中另外添加60mg的氧化锌，连用1周。

label: [{"start":9,"end":10,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"增加鱼粉","labels":["control"]},{"start":53,"end":58,"text":"添加硫酸锌","labels":["control"]},{"start":55,"end":58,"text":"硫酸锌","labels":["drug"]},{"start":59,"end":62,"text":"碳酸锌","labels":["drug"]},{"start":63,"end":66,"text":"氯化锌","labels":["drug"]},{"start":81,"end":84,"text":"氧化锌","labels":["drug"]},{"start":77,"end":84,"text":"饲料中加氧化锌","labels":["control"]}]
text: 正常情况下，每千克鸡饲料中应含有50~100mg锌，可通过增加鱼粉、骨粉、酵母、花生粕、大豆粕等的用量以及添加硫酸锌、碳酸锌和氯化锌补充.必要时可于每千克饲料中加氧化锌5~10mg。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"锰缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":11,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":52,"end":53,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":54,"end":58,"text":"锰缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":60,"end":63,"text":"脱腱症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":64,"end":68,"text":"骨短粗症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":69,"end":72,"text":"滑动腱","labels":["disease"]},{"start":73,"end":77,"text":"膝关节症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"骨骼","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (四)锰缺乏症：锰是鸡生长繁殖所必需的微量元素，对骨骼生长、蛋壳形成、胚胎发育及能量代谢都具有重要作用，鸡的锰缺乏症又称脱腱症、骨短粗症、滑动腱、膝关节症等。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"区性锰缺乏","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 区性锰缺乏的土壤上生长的作物籽实含锰量很低。配方不当，饲料原料中玉米、大麦的含锰量较少。

label: [{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"无机锰","labels":["drug"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"家禽","labels":["type"]}]
text: 在主要以玉米作为饲料时必须添加无机锰以满足家禽对锰的需要。饲料中钙、磷、铁、植酸盐过高会降低锰的吸收利用率；

label: [{"start":3,"end":8,"text":"B族维生素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"球虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":32,"end":37,"text":"胃肠道疾病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":26,"end":27,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 饲料中B族维生素不足会增加对锰的需要量。其他因素，如鸡患球虫病、胃肠道疾病及药物使用不当等时锰的吸收利用会受到影响。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"锰缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"骨短粗症","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"脱腱症","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":11,"end":14,"text":"育成鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 锰缺乏症多发生于雏鸡和育成鸡，特别多见于体重大的品种。常见症状为骨短粗症和脱腱症。

label: [{"start":5,"end":11,"text":"胫跗关节肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":18,"text":"腿骨变粗变短","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"变粗变短","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"跛行","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":34,"text":"跗关节肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"明显错位","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":53,"text":"跗骨近端向外扭转","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":53,"text":"向外扭转","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":57,"text":"腿外展","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":55,"end":57,"text":"外展","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":59,"end":64,"text":"一条腿强直","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":70,"text":"膝关节扁平","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":68,"end":70,"text":"扁平","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":62,"end":64,"text":"强直","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"胫跗关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"腿骨","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":32,"text":"跗关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"胫骨远端","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":45,"end":49,"text":"跗骨近端","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":54,"end":55,"text":"腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":61,"end":62,"text":"腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":65,"end":68,"text":"膝关节","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 前者表现为胫跗关节肿大，腿骨变粗变短，表现跛行。后者表现为跗关节肿胀与明显错位，胫骨远端和跗骨近端向外扭转，腿外展，常一条腿强直，膝关节扁平。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"节面光滑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":16,"text":"腓肠肌腱从髁部滑脱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":22,"text":"腿变曲扭转","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"变曲扭转","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"瘫痪","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"无法站立","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"双腿并发","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"饿死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"腓肠肌腱","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"髁部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"滑脱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":18,"text":"腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"双腿","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 节面光滑，导致腓肠肌腱从髁部滑脱，腿变曲扭转，瘫痪，无法站立。常因双腿并发而不能采食，直至饿死。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"腿骨粗短","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"粗短","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":17,"text":"飞关节肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"扭转","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":30,"text":"跖骨弯曲变形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"弯曲变形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"运动失调","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"腿骨","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"飞关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"胫骨","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"跖骨","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 雏鸡缺锰会发生腿骨粗短，飞关节肿胀、扭转，胫骨、跖骨弯曲变形，运动失调。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":83,"end":85,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":3,"end":10,"text":"产蛋量显著减少","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":11,"end":17,"text":"蛋壳薄易破碎","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":31,"end":37,"text":"胚胎大批死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":38,"end":47,"text":"种蛋孵化率明显降低","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"胚胎畸形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"畸形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":56,"text":"腿短粗","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"短粗","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":57,"end":61,"text":"翅膀缺如","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":59,"end":61,"text":"缺如","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":62,"end":67,"text":"头呈圆球形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":64,"end":67,"text":"圆球形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":68,"end":72,"text":"腹部突出","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":70,"end":72,"text":"突出","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":73,"end":79,"text":"胚体明显水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":85,"end":89,"text":"体质衰弱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":94,"end":100,"text":"神经机能障碍","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":101,"end":105,"text":"运动失调","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":106,"end":110,"text":"骨骼短粗","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":108,"end":110,"text":"短粗","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"胚胎","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"胚胎","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":53,"end":54,"text":"腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":57,"end":59,"text":"翅膀","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":62,"end":63,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":68,"end":70,"text":"腹部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":73,"end":75,"text":"胚体","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":75,"end":79,"text":"明显水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":106,"end":108,"text":"骨骼","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 成年鸡产蛋量显著减少，蛋壳薄易破碎，种蛋入孵后在出雏前1~2天胚胎大批死亡，种蛋孵化率明显降低，胚胎畸形，腿短粗，翅膀缺如，头呈圆球形，腹部突出，胚体明显水肿，孵出的雏鸡体质衰弱，常表现为神经机能障碍，运动失调，骨骼短粗。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"锰缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"软骨病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"软骨病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"锰缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":20,"end":26,"text":"骨骼钙化不全","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"钙化不全","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"骨质柔软","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":39,"end":43,"text":"骨骼变形","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"变形","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":50,"end":54,"text":"骨质坚硬","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"骨骼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"骨骼","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 锰缺乏症与软骨病的鉴别诊断：软骨病的病鸡骨骼钙化不全，骨质柔软，而锰缺乏症虽然骨骼变形，但钙化完全，骨质坚硬。

label: [{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"硫酸锰","labels":["drug"]},{"start":38,"end":43,"text":"高锰酸钾水","labels":["drug"]},{"start":45,"end":46,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":38,"end":49,"text":"高锰酸钾水作为鸡的饮水","labels":["control"]}]
text: 每千克饲料中添加0.12～0.24g硫酸锰，连用4～7天：或采用1:3000高锰酸钾水作为鸡的饮水，现配现用，每天2次，饮2天，停2天，如此反复几次；

label: [{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"氯化胆碱","labels":["drug"]},{"start":20,"end":25,"text":"维生素B₆","labels":["drug"]},{"start":41,"end":44,"text":"缺锰症","labels":["control"]},{"start":50,"end":54,"text":"腿骨变形","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"变形","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"腿骨","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":50,"end":61,"text":"腿骨变形严重者应予淘汰","labels":["control"]}]
text: 同时在每千克饲料中加入氯化胆碱1~2g,维生素B₆20~40mg,连用5天，对早期缺锰症疗效较好。对腿骨变形严重者应予淘汰。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"家禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"家禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":38,"end":49,"text":"合理搭配使用各种矿物质","labels":["control"]}]
text: 正常家禽饲料中应含有锰40~80mg/kg。应根据家禽的各个生长阶段的特点，合理搭配使用各种矿物质和其他营养物质。

label: [{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"碳酸锰","labels":["drug"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"氯化锰","labels":["drug"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"硫酸锰","labels":["drug"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"高锰酸钾","labels":["drug"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"锰补充剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":45,"end":50,"text":"B族维生素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":62,"end":71,"text":"增加饲料中糠麸含量","labels":["control"]}]
text: 通常采用碳酸锰、氯化锰、硫酸锰、高锰酸钾作为锰补充剂。调整钙、磷比例及含量至正常水平，保证B族维生素足量。另外糠麸含锰丰富，增加饲料中糠麸含量也有良好的预防作用。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"铁缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"血红蛋白","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (五)铁缺乏症：铁是动物体内所必需的微量元素，也是构成血红蛋白的重要原料；铁还是动物体内许多酶的成分。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"产蛋鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":28,"end":29,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":41,"end":42,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":43,"end":47,"text":"铁缺乏症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 产蛋鸡对铁的需要量较大，每千克饲料中含铁80mg即能满足鸡对铁的需要量。一般情况下鸡的铁缺乏症较为少见。

label: [{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"尿素","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 饲喂高铜饲料、用棉籽饼替代豆饼或以尿素作蛋白质补充物，又未给动物补充铁。

label: [{"start":0,"end":10,"text":"吸血性内外寄生虫感染","labels":["disease"]},{"start":24,"end":31,"text":"继发性铁缺乏症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 吸血性内外寄生虫感染，因失血而铁损耗大导致缺铁。继发性铁缺乏症常大量发生。用高铜饲料喂猪而未补充铁会干扰铁的吸收。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"贫血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":16,"text":"羽毛缺乏色素","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"缺乏色素","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"颜色变淡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"缺乏光泽","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 鸡体缺铁时表现贫血、羽毛缺乏色素、颜色变淡、缺乏光泽等症状。

label: [{"start":1,"end":5,"text":"硫酸亚铁","labels":["drug"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"硫酸铜","labels":["drug"]},{"start":27,"end":32,"text":"每只鸡口服","labels":["control"]},{"start":29,"end":30,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"自饮","labels":["control"]},{"start":44,"end":45,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 用硫酸亚铁100g,硫酸铜12g,糖浆500mL混合，每只鸡口服1滴，或加入3倍量的水让鸡自饮，都可达到治疗目的。

label: [{"start":1,"end":13,"text":"饲料中添加微量元素添加剂","labels":["control"]},{"start":6,"end":13,"text":"微量元素添加剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"硫酸亚铁","labels":["drug"]},{"start":19,"end":28,"text":"饲料中拌入硫酸亚铁","labels":["control"]}]
text: 在饲料中添加微量元素添加剂，或在每千克饲料中拌入硫酸亚铁130~200mg。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"硒缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"硒缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":13,"end":20,"text":"维生素E缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"硒缺乏","labels":["disease"]},{"start":55,"end":62,"text":"营养缺乏性疾病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":35,"end":41,"text":"骨骼发育不良","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"发育不良","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":46,"end":51,"text":"渗出性素质","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"骨骼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":45,"text":"白肌病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: (六)硒缺乏症：硒缺乏症与维生素E缺乏症有诸多共同之处，硒缺乏可引起以骨骼发育不良、白肌病、渗出性素质为特征的营养缺乏性疾病。

label: [{"start":23,"end":29,"text":"维生素E缺乏","labels":["disease"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"硒缺乏症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 食用饲料一般应补充硒(除极少数地区)而未补充。维生素E缺乏也会造成硒缺乏症发生。其他因素如日粮中硫含量过高会影响硒的吸收等。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"硒缺乏症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 硒缺乏症有一定的地区性、季节性，多集中在冬春两季发生，寒冷多雨是常见发病诱因。

label: [{"start":6,"end":11,"text":"渗出性素质","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"急性","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 其临床症状为渗出性素质，常以2~3周龄的雏鸡发病为多，到3~6周龄时发病率高达80%~90%,多呈急性经过。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"躯体低垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":14,"end":22,"text":"淡蓝色水肿样变化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"淡蓝色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"排稀便","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":34,"end":37,"text":"水样便","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"衰竭死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"躯体","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":7,"end":12,"text":"胸腹部皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"低垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":32,"end":33,"text":"便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":36,"end":37,"text":"便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病雏躯体低垂，胸腹部皮肤出现淡蓝色水肿样变化，可扩展至全身。排稀便或水样便，最后衰竭死亡。

label: [{"start":4,"end":18,"text":"水肿部有淡黄色的胶冻样渗出物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"淡黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":30,"text":"淡黄绿色纤维蛋白凝结物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"淡黄绿色","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 剖检可见水肿部有淡黄色的胶冻样渗出物或淡黄绿色纤维蛋白凝结物。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"白肌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":4,"end":9,"text":"4周龄幼雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":15,"end":21,"text":"全身软弱无力","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"贫血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"腿麻痹","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"麻痹","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"卧地不起","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":34,"end":38,"text":"羽毛松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":39,"end":42,"text":"翅下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":43,"end":47,"text":"衰竭死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":26,"text":"腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":40,"text":"翅","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 白肌病以4周龄幼雏易发，表现为全身软弱无力，贫血，腿麻痹而卧地不起，羽毛松乱，翅下垂，衰竭死亡。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"患禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"骨骼肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"心肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"胸肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"胰脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"肌胃肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":34,"end":35,"text":"脑","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 患禽主要病变在骨骼肌、心肌、胸肌、肝脏、胰脏及肌胃肌肉，其次为肾脏和脑。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"肌肉变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"色淡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"呈煮肉样","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"灰黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":24,"text":"黄白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"点状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"条状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"片状出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病变部肌肉变性、色淡、呈煮肉样，呈灰黄色、黄白色的点状、条状、片状出血。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"心肌扩张变薄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"扩张变薄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":18,"text":"乳头肌内膜有出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"胰脏变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"体积缩小","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"有坚实感","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"心肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":14,"text":"乳头肌内膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"胰脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 心肌扩张变薄，多在乳头肌内膜有出血点，胰脏变性，体积缩小有坚实感。

label: [{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"脑软化症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"维生素E","labels":["drug"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"平衡失调","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"运动障碍","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":39,"text":"神经紊乱症状","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 硒和维生素E均缺乏时可发生脑软化症，主要表现为平衡失调、运动障碍和神经紊乱症状。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"硒缺乏","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":13,"text":"渗出性素质","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"白肌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":20,"end":25,"text":"无脑软化症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":33,"end":36,"text":"白肌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":54,"end":67,"text":"维生素E和含硫氨基酸的缺乏","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 硒缺乏主要表现为渗出性素质与白肌病，通常无脑软化症。研究证明，硒在白肌病中处于协同作用的位置，起主要作用的是维生素E和含硫氨基酸的缺乏。

label: [{"start":1,"end":6,"text":"渗出性素质","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"维生素E","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 在渗出性素质中由于硒与维生素E的互补作用，单一缺乏其中的一种往往不显现病症，多为两者同时缺乏时才发病。

label: [{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"亚硒酸钠","labels":["drug"]},{"start":5,"end":17,"text":"亚硒酸钠生理盐水肌内注射","labels":["control"]},{"start":39,"end":45,"text":"喂维生素E油","labels":["control"]},{"start":40,"end":45,"text":"维生素E油","labels":["drug"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"成鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 0.01%亚硒酸钠生理盐水肌内注射，雏鸡为0.1~0.3mL,成鸡1mL,同时喂维生素E油300IU,4小时后即见症状减轻、好转。

label: [{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"亚硒酸钠","labels":["drug"]},{"start":40,"end":46,"text":"亚硒酸钠饮水","labels":["drug"]},{"start":63,"end":66,"text":"硒过量","labels":["disease"]},{"start":67,"end":71,"text":"抑制生长","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":72,"end":77,"text":"降低孵化率","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":78,"end":86,"text":"增加胚胎的畸形率","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":80,"end":82,"text":"胚胎","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 也可在每千克饲料中添加0.1~0.15mg亚硒酸钠，或每千克饮水中添加1.0mg亚硒酸钠饮水，5~7天为一疗程，但应防止过量，硒过量会抑制生长，降低孵化率，增加胚胎的畸形率。

label: [{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"鸡中毒","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 当每千克饲料中硒的浓度高达4mg时，则会导致鸡中毒。

label: [{"start":43,"end":47,"text":"维生素E","labels":["drug"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"亚硒酸钠","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 正常饲料中应含有0.1~0.2mg/kg的硒，通常以亚硒酸钠形式添加，同时应有20mg维生素E。

label: [{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"饲料补硒","labels":["control"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":50,"end":54,"text":"亚硒酸钠","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 缺硒地区或用缺硒饲料要补硒。每千克饲料补硒0.1mg。可在10日龄雏鸡的饲料中加入0.1mg/kg的亚硒酸钠。

label: [{"start":1,"end":7,"text":"维生素E缺乏","labels":["disease"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"霉菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"维生素E","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 在维生素E缺乏时，对硒的需要量增加。要避免饲料因高温、潮湿、长期贮存或受霉菌污染而造成的维生素E损失。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"镁缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"骨骼","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (七)镁缺乏症：镁是动物机体所必需的常量元素，也是形成骨骼的必需元素。

label: [{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"骨骼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"神经","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 在鸡体内约有70%镁与钙、磷共同构成骨骼，镁对维持神经活动起着重要的作用。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"镁缺乏","labels":["disease"]},{"start":41,"end":44,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"生长缓慢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"痉挛","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"气喘","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"惊厥","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"昏迷","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":48,"end":53,"text":"产蛋量减少","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":54,"end":58,"text":"骨质疏松","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 雏鸡日粮中镁缺乏时，表现生长缓慢，时而发生痉挛，严重时气喘，惊厥，昏迷，甚至死亡。成年鸡缺乏时，产蛋量减少，骨质疏松。

label: [{"start":10,"end":11,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":42,"end":45,"text":"镁缺乏","labels":["disease"]},{"start":62,"end":66,"text":"镁过多症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 一般饲料中都可以满足鸡对镁的需要，不必添加。但在饲料中要防止钙、镁比例失调，以致引起镁缺乏；同时又要防止饲料中含镁过量，形成镁过多症。

label: [{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"痛风","labels":["disease"]},{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"家禽痛风","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":37,"text":"营养代谢性疾病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":41,"end":44,"text":"慢性病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":13,"end":20,"text":"蛋白质代谢障碍","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":26,"text":"肾功能障碍","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":22,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":53,"end":67,"text":"关节中有大量尿酸和尿酸盐沉积","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":59,"end":61,"text":"尿酸","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":62,"end":67,"text":"尿酸盐沉积","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"内脏器官","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":53,"end":55,"text":"关节","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (八)痛风：家禽痛风是体内蛋白质代谢障碍和肾功能障碍所引起的营养代谢性疾病，是一种慢性病。特征是内脏器官或关节中有大量尿酸和尿酸盐沉积。

label: [{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"痛风病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":12,"end":17,"text":"传染性疾病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 死亡率很高。因痛风病不属传染性疾病，所以往往不被人们重视，从而导致损失惨重。

label: [{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"肾损伤","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"损伤","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":25,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":38,"text":"磺胺类药物慢性中毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":39,"end":44,"text":"沙门氏菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":45,"end":52,"text":"传染性支气管炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":53,"end":60,"text":"传染性法氏囊病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":61,"end":67,"text":"艾美耳球虫病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 饲料蛋白质过高，尤其是添加鱼粉，导致尿酸量过大，肾损伤，如磺胺类药物慢性中毒、沙门氏菌病、传染性支气管炎、传染性法氏囊病、艾美耳球虫病等。

label: [{"start":12,"end":18,"text":"维生素A缺乏","labels":["disease"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"痛风","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 高钙日粮或高钙低磷日粮、维生素A缺乏、育雏温度过高或过低、缺水、饲料变质、盐分过高等也可引起痛风。

label: [{"start":3,"end":8,"text":"内脏性痛风","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":14,"end":20,"text":"全身营养障碍","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"食欲不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"逐渐消瘦","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":31,"end":34,"text":"冠苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"羽毛松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":46,"text":"趾部皮肤干枯","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"干枯","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":49,"end":54,"text":"产蛋量减少","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":56,"end":58,"text":"停产","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":31,"end":32,"text":"冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"趾部皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"母鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: (1)内脏性痛风。成年鸡表现全身营养障碍，食欲不振，逐渐消瘦，冠苍白，羽毛松乱，趾部皮肤干枯，母鸡产蛋量减少甚至停产。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"泄殖腔松弛","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"松弛","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":6,"end":15,"text":"不自主地排白色稀粪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"白色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":18,"end":25,"text":"含有多量尿酸盐","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":39,"text":"稀粪常污染泄殖腔下部的羽毛","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"泄殖腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":15,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":28,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":39,"text":"泄殖腔下部的羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 泄殖腔松弛，不自主地排白色稀粪，其中含有多量尿酸盐，稀粪常污染泄殖腔下部的羽毛；

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"脱水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":12,"text":"皮肤颜色变暗","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"颜色变暗","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":47,"text":"脾脏表面覆盖一层白色尿酸盐沉淀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":47,"text":"尿酸盐沉淀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":54,"text":"石灰样白膜","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":55,"end":66,"text":"表面有微小的粉末状沉淀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":67,"end":71,"text":"肾脏苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":69,"end":71,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":72,"end":74,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":75,"end":80,"text":"输尿管增粗","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":86,"end":90,"text":"棍状结石","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":78,"end":80,"text":"增粗","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"胸膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":23,"text":"肠系膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":25,"text":"心","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"腹膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"脾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":67,"end":69,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":75,"end":78,"text":"输尿管","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 脱水，肌肉和皮肤颜色变暗，剖检可见胸膜、肠系膜及心、肝脏、腹膜、脾脏表面覆盖一层白色尿酸盐沉淀，似石灰样白膜，表面有微小的粉末状沉淀，肾脏苍白，肿大，输尿管增粗(如重症常有棍状结石)。

text: 鸡痛风病是鸡的一种营养代谢性疾病，是由于蛋白质代谢障碍引起的尿酸盐沉积症。

label: [{"start":38,"end":45,"text":"蛋白质代谢障碍","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: (1)动物性饲料过多，蛋白质成分含量过高，如肉粉、血粉、鱼粉等的长期喂饲，使蛋白质代谢障碍所致。

text: (2)矿物质添加不合理，饲料中含钙质和镁元素过多，或使用蛋鸡料喂青年鸡、雏鸡、肉鸡等，均会引起鸡痛风病。

text: (3)饲料中缺乏维生素A,调节蛋白质代谢功能失调，易引发鸡痛风病。

text: (6)饲养管理不当，卫生条件极差，日粮不足，营养缺乏等可促进鸡痛风病的发生。

text: (九)脂肪肝出血综合征：脂肪肝综合征是发生于产蛋鸡和肉用仔鸡的一种脂类代谢障碍性疾病。

label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"脂肪肝出血综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"产蛋鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":17,"end":24,"text":"产蛋量急剧下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":31,"end":40,"text":"肝脏积聚大量的脂肪","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":48,"text":"肝脂肪变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":60,"end":63,"text":"内出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":58,"text":"肝包膜易发生撕裂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":68,"end":77,"text":"脂肪肝-出血综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"患病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":44,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":50,"end":53,"text":"肝包膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":56,"end":58,"text":"撕裂","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 脂肪肝出血综合征以产蛋鸡多发，导致产蛋量急剧下降，患病鸡多由于肝脏积聚大量的脂肪，出现肝脂肪变性，使肝包膜易发生撕裂导致内出血，故又称为脂肪肝-出血综合征。

label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"脂肪肝出血综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":29,"end":32,"text":"肾苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":28,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":30,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 脂肪肝出血综合征也发生于10~30日龄肉仔鸡，剖检可见肝、肾苍白、肿胀。一般情况下，死亡率不超过6%,但有时也可高达20%。

text: 脂肪肝出血综合征的发生主要受遗传、营养、环境和其他因素的影响。遗传因素，即不同品种鸡对脂肪肝出血综合征的敏感性不同，肉用种鸡比蛋用品种具有更高的发病率。

text: 黄曲霉毒素中毒、温度过高、惊吓、饲养方式、性别、抗生素等也能使发病率增加。

text: 发病鸡无明显症状，主要表现为肥胖，超出正常体重的20%~30%。蛋鸡和肉用种鸡生产性能下降，产蛋率可由80%逐渐降到50%,或根本达不到产蛋高峰。

text: 肉用仔鸡嗜眠、麻痹和突然死亡，多发生于生长良好的10～30日龄仔鸡，病死率一般在6%,有时高达30%。有些病例呈现生物素缺乏症的表现，喙周围皮炎，足趾干裂，羽毛生长不良。

text: 由于肝外膜破裂引起致命性的出血，导致鸡的死亡，比正常平均死亡率高2%～10%。剖检可见病鸡肝脏肿大、颜色发黄、易碎、肝包膜下有大小不等的出血点，有时可见血凝块或肝脏破裂，腹腔有血凝块等，腹腔及内脏周围有大量的脂肪沉积。

text: 对发病鸡群，每吨日粮添加氯化胆碱22~110g,连用2周或每吨日粮添加维生素E10000IU,维生素B₁₂12mg,肌醇900g,连续饲喂2周，有较好疗效。

text: 根据具体情况科学配制针对于不同品种、不同产蛋率的鸡饲料。饲料中胆碱、肌醇、蛋氨酸、维生素E、维生素B₁₂、亚硒酸钠等嗜脂因子的添加量不宜过高。

text: 加强饲养管理，提供适宜的生活空间和环境温度。减少鸡的应激。鸡群换喂全价日粮，对防止脂肪肝出血综合征的发生有良好的作用。
